author: James Hockaday
title: Laughing gas dealer caught with more than 25,000 canisters is jailed
description: That's one hell of a mugshot.

author: Andrew Feinberg
title: Trump Pentagon officials ‘wiped’ Jan 6 messages off phones
description: Mobile phones belonging to top Defence Department officials, including the then-acting Secretary of Defence and senior US army officials, had text messages sent and recieved around the January 6 attack on the Capitol “wiped” from them, according to court documents.

title: NYC woman sues at-home massage app Soothe claiming male therapist raped her
description: The woman is not named in her lawsuit against the California-based start-up, filed yesterday in Brooklyn's Supreme Court. Her lawyers tell DailyMail.com she was left traumatized by the attack.

author: Holly Patrick
title: Ayman al-Zawahiri: Who was the al-Qaeda leader?
description: Joe Biden announced on Monday, 1 August, that the al-Qaeda leader Ayman al-Zawahiri had been killed in a drone strike.

author: Callum McAvoy
title: Granit Xhaka compares youngster Marquinhos to fellow Arsenal forward Gabriel Martinelli
description: 'I see a big future for this guy.'

title: Chris Cuomo will join NewsNation on multimillion dollar deal for an 8pm slot from October 3
description: The TV anchor will get a multimillion dollar salary for his role with the fledgling media outfit, which will be taped from Manhattan.

author: Sean Seddon
title: Petrol firms ‘keeping prices high despite falling wholesale costs’
description: The RAC has accused big chains of failing to pass savings on to customers.

author: Patrick Arundell
title: Your daily horoscope for Wednesday, August 3, 2022
description: Virgo, let things unfold to see what your future holds.

author: Eric Garcia
title: Senate passes burn pit bill a week after Republicans blocked legislation
description: “The whole thing was a gut punch for everybody,” comedian and advocate Jon Stewart toldThe Independent about how Republicans celebrated after last week’s vote failed.

author: Amber Raiken
title: Mother reveals her three-year-old son contracted Powassan virus from a tick bite
description: ‘Most importantly, advocate for your kids,’ the mother urges parents after her son’s experience

title: [Video]: Tense moment Comanchero bikie boss Mark Buddle was arrested in Darwin by AFP
description: The nation's most wanted man was apprehended by Australian Federal Police over alleged drug importation after he touched down in Darwin.

title: Lawyer and her convicted killer brother make gun shapes with their hands as they pose for photos
description: Campaigners have blasted pictures of a convicted killer and his sister who made 'gun signs' while posing inside a prison.

title: Geoff Clark, ex-ATSIC chief facing $2million fraud charges, threatens senator Jacinta Price
description: Former ATSIC chairman Geoff Clark is currently facing 380 charges of fraud and deception for allegedly misappropriating government funds for Indigenous groups between 2000 and 2010.

author: Louis Chilton
title: Monica Lewinsky asks Beyoncé to remove old lyric about her after Renaissance edit: ‘While you’re at it’
description: Singer is already editing the album to remove an ableist slur

author: Connie Evans and Lamiat Sabin
title: Rebekah Vardy says she feels ‘let down by legal system’ in new interview
description: Vardy says in first interview she will insist until she is “blue in the face” that she did not leak stories

title: Moderna vaccine for Australians under five as fatality rate 0.1 per cent
description: Quarantine mandates remain in place and there are calls to re-introduce restrictions designed to protect the vulnerable while striving to reach vaccination targets.

author: Alex McCarthy
title: Dana White has had verbal run-ins with Jake Paul but MMA boss once saved Logan Paul from getting beaten up at UFC 264 after buying tickets to Conor McGregor in ‘wrong seats’
description: Dana White has had verbal run-ins with Jake Paul but MMA boss once saved Logan Paul from getting beaten up at UFC 264 after buying tickets to Conor McGregor in ‘wrong seats’

title: Death toll in McKinney Fire rises to four after two people are found dead in their burnt-out homes
description: Raging Northern California forest fires claimed two more lives as the death toll rose to four from what has become the state's largest blaze brought on by blistering heat and bone-dry conditions.

author: Andy Sims
title: On this day in 2014: Lizzie Armitstead and Geraint Thomas win Commonwealth gold
description: The pair triumphed on the final day of the Glasgow Games.

title: Anthony Albanese REFUSES to apologise for scrapping election promise
description: The Prime Minister had promised the cut during the election campaign, insisting that cheaper renewable energy would bring down prices.

author: Thomas Kingsley
title: New top Covid symptom in patients revealed by latest data as infections surge across UK
description: Total of 3.8m people estimated to have had the virus, latest figures show, up from 3.3m a week earlier

title: Boy, 1, dies after car driven by his grandmother runs him over
description: A one-year-old boy has died in a Queensland hospital after he was run over by a car being driven by his grandmother.

title: Colorado lifeguard delivers BABY on YMCA pool deck after woman's waters broke while was swimming
description: A Colorado lifeguard brought life into the world after she was called into action when a swimmer went into labor on the pool deck where she was working.

author: Mary-Kate Findon
title: Nancy Pelosi sends ‘unequivocal message’ that ‘America stands with Taiwan’
description: Nancy Pelosi has said that the US wants Taiwan to have "freedom with security" during her visit to the country on 3 August.

author: Saman Javed
title: Rebekah Vardy ‘suffering from PTSD’ after losing libel trial against Coleen Rooney
description: Vardy says she has been admitted to hospital twice because of stress
